title: AI Infographic Generator
subtitle: Upload your notesï¼Œpictures or text and instantly generate clear infographics.

form.textarea_placeholder: Paste your study notes, key points or course content here.

upload.button_label: Read content from file (PDF / Word / TXT)
upload.hint: You can also paste or edit the content to be converted in the text area below.
upload.hint_batch: Supports PDF, DOCX, TXT, images, etc.
upload.hint_reference: Upload an image as style reference (optional)
upload.file_info: Loaded content from "{fileName}". The text in the box below will be used to generate the infographic.
upload.file_read_error: Failed to read file content. Please ensure the file is not corrupted and is in a supported format.

actions.generating: AI is creating the infographic task...

edit.title: Edit Infographic
edit.subtitle: Modify the prompt and regenerate your infographic.
edit.dialog_desc: Draw a region on the image to edit, or enter a description for global changes
edit.global_placeholder: Describe the changes you want to make. If no region is selected, the entire image will be regenerated...
edit.drag_hint: Drag on the image to select a region
edit.drag_hint_sub: Or enter a description above for global changes
edit.region_placeholder: Describe what to change in this region...
edit.regional_hint: Only the selected regions will be modified, other areas remain unchanged
edit.global_hint: The entire image will be regenerated based on your description
edit.no_content: Please select a region or enter a description

result.title: Generation result
result.empty_hint: Tip: generation may take a few seconds. Please wait for the image to finish loading.
result.loading: AI is generating the infographic, please wait...
result.click_to_enlarge: Click the image to view it in large size

errors.no_content: Please upload a file or paste the knowledge content you want to convert first.
errors.generate_failed: Failed to generate infographic. Please try again later.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred while generating the infographic. Please try again later.
errors.poll_failed: An error occurred while querying the infographic result. Please try again later.
errors.timeout: Infographic generation timeout. Please try again later.
errors.generation_failed: Infographic generation failed. Please try again later.
errors.reference_image_too_large: Reference image is too large, please select an image smaller than 10MB
errors.task_not_found: Task not found or access denied
